t: AHEAD OF WORKERS’ UNION VOTE, “AMAZON MOBILIZED AN ARMY”
s: Today 4,000 Amazon workers at a North Carolina warehouse will finish voting on a union. Employees say the company “mobilized an army” ahead of the election, siccing local police on organizers and trying to pit black and Hispanic workers against each other.
